exam.question: I’d ______ his reputation with other farmers and business people in the community, and then make a decision about whether or not to approve a loan.

answer.explain: 句意： 我想先考虑他与社区其他农民和商人交往的信誉， 之后再决定是否同意为他提供贷款。account for： 解释； make up for： 补偿； make out： 开出， 写出。

sentences.sContent: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.sCn: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.sContent: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.sCn: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.sContent: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.sCn: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

sentences.sContent: ...the company may still be cursing its decision to promote cheap choices over more expensive ones because items on its "value menu" now account for around 20% of all sales...
...Three points can account for my view...
...She preferred to shop where we had an account and where everyone knew who she was...
...it fails to take into account that the human body continues to fight against weight loss long after dieting has stopped...
...who's paying what into the joint account and how much you keep separately...
...Blinded by Gender Dale is an account executive who attended one of my workshops on supervising a diverse workforce...

synos.tran: [会计]帐户；解释；帐目，帐单；理由

phrases.pCn: 在某人帐上重视，	记帐
对…负有责任；对…做出解释；说明……的原因
银行存款；银行往来帐户
没用的；无交易；未交帐户；无会计科目
资本性帐户；固定资产帐户
活期存款；支票户头；活期存款户头

remMethod.val: ac(表加强) ＋ count(数) → 账目需要一数再数， 保证正确 → 账目

words.tran: 有责任的；有解释义务的；可解释的

trans.tranOther: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out
